dct_description_sm: See general notes. No page number in upper right.

California as an island with rounded top. One bay at northern end and numerous islands at midpoint and at southern end. Double hemisphere world map with sun and moon (top, left and right) and symbols of the four elements below. Sunburst with Hebrew inscription at top center. Title on bar across top. Korea is shown as an island, and large antarctic continent labeled Terra Australis covers nearly half of the southern hemisphere.

Issued in: Historische Chronica / by Johan Gottfried. -- Frankfurt: Wolffgang Hoffmann, 1642, and Vermehrte Archotologia Cosmica / by J. Gorhm. --np, 1695, in state 1. An earlier state, without the the title at top was published in Piazza Universale / by Tomaso Garzoni. -- Venice: np, 1585/1586.
Shirley 356A and corrigenda for this state, Tooley p.435
